snippet.title: Off The Chains Disc Golf Steam VR Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Off The Chains Disc Golf is a lighthearted disc golf simulation developed for VR from the ground up. We’ve developed this game to be VR-first because we believe that there is something really magical about being fully immersed and lining up your shot like you do in the real life sport.

View the game on the Steam Store (and remember to wishlist!):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1372700/Off_The_Chains_Disc_Golf/

Join our discord to sign up for the Beta:
https://discord.com/invite/FSPf6AK
